resources.string: Press again to exit the program
Provisional account each test can only save 10 data, in order to better manage your data, please log in using the Coolyun account registration!
Testing the quality of ambient air…
Test completed. The system is analyzing…
Your physical condition is scored by allowing for the heart rate, pulse rate, and SpO2 values. The condition indicates the stability of your heart and blood indexes in quiet rest.
Your lifestyle is admirably healthy. The results indicate that you are vigorous and energetic.
You are in good physical state. Maybe you can share your health-keeping experience among your associates.
You had better drink enough water and take some exercise. It is important to keep a healthy lifestyle and be optimistic.
It seems that you have not slept well recently.
Test results indicate that you are highly pressurized. Relax and learn to adjust yourself.
You are a little bit tired.
You need to relax and replenish energy. It is recommended that you take deep breaths and eat some snacks, fruits, or nuts.
You look tired possibly because you have suffered from high pressure but taken insufficient rest.
You may look powerful to others. In fact, subhealth is haunting you.
You are surely fatigued. You ought to take a nap. Maybe inspiration will emerge in your dreams.
Enjoy some light music and take a nap to refresh yourself.
It seems that you have been nervous for long without enough sleep. If allowing this lifestyle to continue, you may be vulnerable to dyspepsia or even heart disease.
Hey, workaholic! You have worked in an overloaded way for long. The most pressing issue is a physical recovery from the subhealth condition.
Life is a marathon where no one can spurt all the way to the end. You are about to collapse due to long-time high pressure. To relax is most important.
Stop working right now and go to bed. You are advised to take a vacation with your family and refresh yourself.
"The system encounters test errors possibly because: 1. You fingers have incorrectly touched contacts on the hub. 2. You fail to keep still during the test. 3. The hub has been moved."
Relax and remember to keep still during the test. It is recommended that you follow the instructions and retry.
You have not drunk any alcohol.
You had better have some milk, yogurt, or oranges 30 minutes before drinking alcohol.
Some alcohol keeps you warm, right?
It is really hard for you to abstain from alcohol.
Have some fructose-rich drink, such as honey-blended water or fresh fruit juice.
You are drinking in an unshackled way.
"Are you drinking to forget something? It's not that easy."
Eat some bananas, cabbages, or celery.
You are drunk. Remember not to drive a car yourself.
So much alcohol drunk! Don’t forget to pay for it.
Have some brine or millet soup, or keep a slice of ginger in mouth.
When the countdown starts, exhale into the test holes on the hub.
Impact analysis：Air quality near HUB and corresponding damage!
Advice:Air quality monitoring results and give some suggestions for you!
Impact analysis：The content of toxic air is rather low.
Advice:Keep ventilating your room. You had better stay outdoors for a couple of hours per day.
Impact analysis：The content of toxic air is high.
Advice:Staying here long will make you sick. Ventilate your room.
Impact analysis：The content of toxic air is extremely high.
Advice:Open the window and leave here right now.
Errors exist in footstep data to be synced. No log will be generated.
No valid data to be synced. No log will be generated.
No data on the hub. Perform calculation and sync again.
No Bluetooth connection to the hub. Reconnect and sync.
Sync timed out. Check the Bluetooth connection.
Errors exist in data to be synced. Sync again.
No data on the watch. Perform calculation and sync again.
No Bluetooth connection to the watch. Reconnect and sync.
Your role data is incomplete. Ensure that you have filled in your name and birthday.
SIM card not inserted or unavailable.
User name cannot be left blank.
It does not support email account password.
Your password is too short. Enter a new password.
This account has expired. Log in again with a valid account.
Password set successfully. Log in again.
Password set successfully. Welcome to CoolFit.
Failed to set password. Enter a new password.
You are logged in, getting the Coolyun account information, please wait…
%1$s has not been synchronized to the server. Data will be lost if you exit. Are you sure you want to exit?
Are you sure you want to exit?
Verification code cannot be left blank.
Enter a password consisting of 6 to 16 characters.
Inconsistent passwords. Enter the password again.
Failed to register. Log in using a valid account.
Account registered. Enter the password to log in.
Registered successfully. Set a password for it.
Phone number or email address for login
Verification %1$s sent. If you fail to receive the %2$s within 3 minutes, please retry.
Did not receive verification code? Click here to send again.
Error occurred when the test result screenshot is taken. Failed to share.
Are you sure you want to delete the record?
CoolFit has accompanied you for %1$d days.
CoolFit helps learn whether you are tired or not by testing your heart rate and SpO2. Do not test in the sun and avoid strenuous exercise before the test.
CoolFit detects the alcohol concentration from your exhalation, helping control alcohol intake. Do not drive a car after drinking alcohol.
CoolFit helps avert the exposure to toxic gases, such as CO and CH2O, by detecting their contents in the air.
CoolFit helps learn about your activity during a day by calculating your footsteps.
Failed to connect. Check whether the hub is started up and whether Bluetooth is enabled.

This legal agreement between you and Coolpad Software Tech (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd. (referred to as Coolpad), and between you and related service providers governs your use of the CoolFit service. You are perceived as having read, understood, and accepted the agreement when using CoolFit in any form or by any means.

CoolFit is a mobile application developed by Coolpad to help you effectively manage your physical fitness data. Specifically, this application detects physical indexes and traces the changes, rather than diagnoses, monitors, or cures diseases, or launches realtime health-related news. Furthermore, it displays health maintenance advice, which serves as reference only, by interoperating with data collection gadgets or the server over the Internet. Except as expressly prescribed by laws, Coolpad does not guarantee the appropriateness, accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any content or service made available through this application.

Your Coolpad phone can be connected to gadgets for CoolFit to interoperate with physical data collection programs. The gadgets and related programs may be provided by Coolpad or a third party, and the connection modes include but are not limited to Bluetooth. Thoroughly read the terms and conditions for using the gadgets or programs before connecting them to your phone.

When serving you, CoolFit instructs you to enter your personal data, such as birthday, gender, height, and weight, or obtains the data using data collection gadgets, and transmits the data to the CoolCloud server for storage. The accuracy of the data primarily determines the effectiveness of CoolFit functions. Under no circumstance will your personal data be transferred or dumped to a third-party server, or be accessed by any application, person, or entity other than yourself. You are authorized, however, to publicize or share your physical data using specific applications, which can gain access only after having been permitted by yourself and claimed the compliance to all relevant laws and regulations.

Technically, CoolFit provides cloud-based instant synchronization service for your personal data. Therefore, using all functions related to this application necessitates connecting to the data network. Upon your initial use, the system displays messages prompting you to log in or register with CoolCloud. During the registration, CoolFit uses your phone to send a message, which will be charged by your carrier, to the CoolCloud server. In addition to this message, using CoolFit will generate no extra charge. To ensure service reliability, the CoolCloud server stores data that has been deleted from your CoolFit client until the specified backup period expires.
CoolFit gratefully derives its air quality test data, which has been officially publicized by Ministry of Environmental Protection of China, from www.pm25.in.
感谢您使用本公司CP-HUB002产品
本产品适用于DC-5V输入的电子数码产品
警告：只能使用经过酷派认可的、适用于此特定型号设备的充电器。使用其他品牌的充电器和配件可能违反设备的认可或保修条款，并可能导致危险。使用未经过认可的充电器可能存在火灾、爆炸或发生其他危险的风险。
"•在使用本产品之前，请尽快仔细阅读本用户使用说明书。 •CP-HUB002是一款集合了心率与血氧测试、计步、酒精检测、VOC气体监测以及移动电源多项功能的产品，是您身边的健康管家。"
"•软件产品实时更新,如有升级恕不另行通知。 •所述检测结果仅作为自检数据，并不能作为医疗、司法、环境等相关事件的依据。"

"•切勿将本产品摆放在地毯、加热器、纺织品材料或暴露在阳光直射下。 •切勿摔碰、挤压、自行拆卸或者刺穿本产品。 •切勿将本产品置于高温、低温、潮湿环境下。 •切勿将本产品投入火中、水中或者含有腐蚀性的液体里。 •人体在潮湿状态下请勿接触本产品。 •充电时温度请保持在0℃~40℃之间。 •充电时请勿将本产品放在易燃物质上。 •如发现产品有膨胀或者其他不良现象和故障时，请立即停止使用本产品，并联系您的销售商。 •本产品给手机充电时，禁止使用手机接听电话或娱乐等，这易出现安全事故。"
•驾驶时应始终全神贯注，在驾驶中有来电，请离开车道并停车。如果驾驶条款中规定可以使用免提通话装置，建议您仅使用适用于您手机的“车内免提”装置。
•请将本产品放在儿童接触不到的地方。请勿让儿童使用本产品，儿童可能会造成对自己或他人的损伤，并可能会不小心损坏本产品。本产品里的一些小部件可能会被拆卸，若被吞咽将会造成危险。
移动电源功能：本产品具有充电宝功能，可对手机、MP3等设备进行快速充电。
NFC功能：本产品具有NFC功能，通过与支持NFC的手机接触来实现与手机自动蓝牙配对功能。
提示：NFC芯片为无源器件，不主动产生场强，仅作为标签功能。
提示：必须在手机端下载并安装酷健康APK。
心率和血氧：本产品有检测您的心率和血氧饱和度功能，通过手机酷健康应用进行控制操作和显示检测结果。
计步器和气压计：本产品有检测步数和当前气压功能，通过手机酷健康应用进行数据同步显示检测结果。
酒精检测：本产品有检测当前空气中酒精含量浓度等功能，通过手机酷健康应用进行控制操作和显示检测结果。
VOC气体监测：本产品有检测当前空气中有害化学物（一氧化碳、甲醛）含量浓度等功能，通过手机酷健康应用进行控制操作和显示检测结果。

"1.确保兼容的手机处于开机状态且蓝牙开启； 2.长按CP-HUB002电源开关键（如图1 ①电源键）CP-HUB002启动，此时蓝牙CP-HUB002蓝牙自动开启，蓝牙键（如图1 ②蓝牙键）按键灯为蓝色； 3.若CP-HUB002已开机且蓝牙处于关闭状态，请长按蓝牙键开启，蓝牙启动后，按键灯为蓝色； 4.当您需心率血氧检测、酒精测试、VOC气体监测等功能时只需点击酷健康主界面的相对应功能即可实现CP-HUB002和手机自动配对连接。具体操作步骤请参照相关章节。"
CP-HUB002通过与手机“酷健康”APP连接，实现全新智能健康新体验。您可通过扫描本用户使用说明书上或包装盒上的二维码下载“酷健康”APP。
CP-HUB002启动后，拔出对外充电线（如图1 ⑧对外充电线）插入其它设备兼容USB口（如手机、MP3等），即可为手机充电。
如果兼容手机支持NFC，请打开其NFC功能；CP-HUB002开机后用CP-HUB002的NFC区域（如图3所示）触碰手机上的NFC感应线圈区域，CP-HUB002将自动配对连接至手机蓝牙上。
提示：NFC芯片为无源器件，不主动产生场强，仅作为标签功能。如果手机不支持NFC，请手动配对CP-HUB002。
因CP-HUB002的功能较多，是采用软件管控的方式执行程序。如CP-HUB002出现无法使用或死机的状态，请使用顶针按下复位键（如图2 ⑤复位键），CP-HUB002内部软件将会恢复出厂设置状态。
用电源适配器给本产品充电时（请选择输出范围为DC 5V 700mA的电源适配器），请将配带的充电转接线USB一端接入电源适配器，另一端接上Micro 5 Pin输入口（如图2 ④USB充电口），即可为CP-HUB002充电。
正常工作温度范围在0℃~40℃之间。
"宇龙计算机通信科技（深圳）有限公司 地址：深圳市南山区高新技术工业园北区酷派信息港 邮政编码：518057 服务热线：0769-23075280 宇龙网址：http://www.yulong.com 酷派网址：http://www.coolpad.cn 售后服务网点查询：拨打服务热线，根据语音提示输入所在地区的区号查询；上酷派官网查询(http://www.coolpad.cn)。"
心率血氧检测：确保CP-HUB002的电源和蓝牙已开启的前提下，在酷健康应用中打开心率血氧检测功能，待手机和CP-HUB002连接成功后，按照手机界面提示选择角色和握持CP-HUB002（如图4所示），即可进行检测。检测结果会即时在酷健康应用中显示出来。
"•如图4握持CP-HUB002（USB充电口朝向自己），左手中指的第一个关节要覆盖两个血氧测试触点，不能漏光。左手食指、右手食指、右手中指分别轻压在三个心率测试触点上。 •测试过程保持安静、放松心态。 •测试时间为60秒钟，请耐心等待。"
酒精测试：确保CP-HUB002的电源和蓝牙已开启的前提下，在酷健康应用中打开酒精测试功能，待手机和CP-HUB002连接成功后，按照界面提示步骤操作，对准HUB的VOC气体采样口吹气（深呼吸之后，再长长地吐气，如图5所示），即可检测出您呼出气体酒精浓度高低。
提示：一般人喝完一杯酒后过1.5小时才能被吸收到血液中，这时候测试出来的酒精浓度比较准确。
气体监测：确保CP-HUB002的电源和蓝牙已开启的前提下，在酷健康应用中打开VOC气体监测功能，待手机和CP-HUB002连接成功后，静置HUB，并保持VOC气体采样口（图2 ③VOC气体采样口）通风顺畅，即可实时检测周围的空气中VOC气体含量是否超标等情况。
提示：VOC气体监测功能可以单独使用，在CP-HUB002与酷健康连接后并处于VOC气体监测状态时，CP-HUB002即使断开与手机的蓝牙连接，也可以单独监测，并可根据VOC气体浓度变化进行语音提示。

使用计步伙伴：当您拿着CP-HUB002进行了一次散步/跑步等运动后，可以把运动数据同步到酷健康应用中并查看相关结果。确保CP-HUB002的电源和蓝牙已开启的前提下，在酷健康里打开计步伙伴功能，待手机和CP-HUB002连接成功后，按照界面提示选择角色和同步，等待片刻，即可把HUB端的计步数据同步到酷健康应用中。同步后会显示运动结果包括步数、运动时长、运动里程、所消耗卡路里、环境大气压强等数据。
提示：成功同步后，CP-HUB002将重新开始计步，CP-HUB002端最多可以保存10条记录，当记录超过10条时，时间较旧的记录将被删除掉。当您重启CP-HUB002后，上一次的记录将保存，并重新开始计步。为了消除无效计步数据的干扰，我们将计步时长低于1分钟，步数小于30步的记录视为无效记录，无效记录同步后会自动删除，不会保存在您的历史记录中。
图3. CP-HUB002心率血氧测试触点
图4. CP-HUB002心率血氧测试握持方法
If you fill in more details, the test results will be more accurate.

Current user has no height or weight information. Exercise distance and calorie consumption will fail to be calculated. To ensure that the footstep calculation feature better serves you, fill in user details completely and sync data.
1. Q: What is the hub mentioned?

A: This hub is CP-HUB002, a portable battery charger that integrates the functions of calculating footsteps, detecting air pressure and air contents, and checking the heart rate and SpO2. In addition, it works as a Bluetooth handset for answering a call and playing music.
2. Q: What are the specific functions of the hub?

A: Specific functions include calculating footsteps, detecting air pressure and quality, checking the heart rate and SpO2, and testing alcohol concentration from exhalation. After the Bluetooth connection is established between phone and hub, you can select a test module on the CoolFit home page to start a test as guided.
3. Q: How do I connect the hub and phone?

A: Start up the hub. That is, hold the power key until the power indicator is illuminated. After you select a test module, the system automatically establishes the Bluetooth connection and begins a test.
4. Q: What do I do when the phone fails to be connected to the hub?

A: Initially, check whether the Bluetooth function is enabled on the phone and the hub. You can restart the hub or hold the call key to enable the Bluetooth function on the hub, and select a test module to establish Bluetooth connection. If this issue persists after you restart the phone and hub and enable their Bluetooth functions, touch Help > To appraise and send your comments for feedback.
5. Q: Can the hub work with other phones?

A: CoolFit must be installed only on Android 4.0 or a later version OS for the phone to work with the hub. Consult related sales personnel before the purchase, or touch Help > To appraise for online consultation.
6. Q: How do I detect my heart rate and SpO2 using the hub?

A: Enable the Bluetooth function on both the hub and the phone, and select Fatigue test on the CoolFit home page. The system will automatically connect the phone and the hub and redirect you to the test preparation page. You can select or create a role and learn how to perform a test with the help of the animation. After you tap Start test, the test page is displayed. During a test, follow the correct gestures to touch the test contacts with your fingertips. The test page will display the heart rate waveform, pulse rate waveform, heart rate value, SpO2 value, and pulse rate value in real time. After a one-minute countdown, CoolFit generates a test report for you and provides corresponding analysis and suggestions.
7. Q: What is the technical principle of detecting heart rate and SpO2?

A: The hub has integrated an infrared SpO2 detector and 3-lead heart rate detector. The two components detect SpO2, heart rate, and pulse rate values and generates corresponding waveforms in real time.
8. Q: What do I do when the heart rate and SpO2 values obtained are not accurate?

"A: The following factors significantly affect the accuracy of heart rate and SpO2 values: - Ambient humidity - Operation mode - Dryness of fingertips To obtain accurate heart rate and SpO2 values, keep the test contacts on the hub and your fingertips dry and clean, touch the test contacts correctly, and remain in a silent and relaxed state."
9. Q: How do I use the hub to test alcohol concentration?

A: Enable the Bluetooth function on both the hub and the phone, and select Alcohol test on the CoolFit home page. The system will automatically connect the phone and the hub and redirect you to the test preparation page. You can select or create a role and learn how to perform a test with the help of the animation. After you tap Start test, the test page is displayed. The system starts a test countdown after the hub initializes for a few seconds. During the test countdown, exhale into the test holes by following the animated gestures. CoolFit generates a test report for you and provides corresponding analysis and suggestions after the countdown.
10. Q: How do I use the hub to test the air quality?

A: Enable the Bluetooth function on both the hub and the phone, and select Atmosphere test on the CoolFit home page. The system will automatically connect the phone and the hub and redirect you to the test preparation page. After you tap Start test, the hub detects the toxic air content within 10 seconds. To ensure the accuracy of test results, avoid blocking air detection holes on the hub. After the animation play, CoolFit generates a test report for you and provides corresponding analysis and suggestions.
11. Q: What is the technical principle of detecting alcohol concentration and air quality?
A: The hub has integrated an air sensor, which can detect the concentration of hydrocarbon and carbon oxide, such as ethanol, CO, and CH2O.
12. Q: What do I do when the alcohol concentration and air quality values obtained are not accurate?

A: The hub can detect and provide only relative concentration levels concerning ethanol and toxic air for the current location. Ensure that test holes are unblocked before a test. Place the hub in fresh air for calibration after long term use.The normal working temperature range between 0 °C ~40 °C.
13. Q: How do I calibrate the hub?

A: Place the hub in fresh air while keeping the test holes unblocked. Then, enable the Bluetooth function on both the phone and the hub, choose Settings > Chip calibration, and tap Start on the calibration page. CoolFit will calibrate related hub parameters for you.
14. Q: How do I use the hub to calculate footsteps?

A: After being started up, the hub automatically enables the functions of calculating footsteps and detecting air pressure. When you shut down the hub, all the footstep and air pressure data is stored in the hub as a record. You can synchronize the data from the hub to the server. Ensure that the system time of the phone is correct before synchronization. Otherwise, the footstep data may be inaccurate.
15. Q: How do I synchronize my footstep data?

A: Enable the Bluetooth function on both the hub and the phone, and select Footstep calculator on the CoolFit home page. The system will automatically connect the phone and the hub and redirect you to the synchronization preparation page. After you select or create a role and tap Start sync, CoolFit will receive data synchronized from the hub and generate a report, which helps you learn about your exercise distance and duration, footstep number, and the calorie consumption.
16. Q: Why is the No valid data synchronized from the hub. message displayed?

A: The footstep calculator works immediately after the hub starts up. The system perceives the footstep data recorded within the first minute after hub startup or within 30 steps as invalid. When invalid data is synchronized to the phone, the system will generate no report.
17. Q: Why are the distance and calorie are recorded as zero?
A: CoolFit calculates the distance and calorie for you only when the height and weight parameters have been set.
18. Q: How do I check historical test records?
A: All the test records will be stored to the CoolCloud server. You can view these records on the Record stream page when the mobile network is connected.
19. Q: Can I view historical test records when the mobile network is not connected?
A: When the mobile network is not connected, you can view only the buffered records in your phone. When you shut down CoolFit, these records will be cleared.
20. Q: How do I clear the data in the hub?
A: The hub does not store test data except a maximum of 10 items of footstep data, which, however, will be deleted from the hub after being synchronized to the server.
Please select the restart time interval measurement

"The test results will be more accurate after chip calibration. It is recommended that you perform calibration at least once a week. Ensure that the hub has started up and established Bluetooth connection with the phone before the calibration."
Failed to calibrate. Ensure that the device has started up and has its Bluetooth function enabled.
More accurate test results after Calibration
"Calibrating… The calibration time of about 2 minutes Please be calibrated in a clean environment"
Start the CWatch application and sync again.
kPa (Air pressure test is not supported.)
Impact: The air quality is satisfactory.
Impact: The air quality is acceptable. Some pollutants may slightly affect a few sensitive populations.
Impact: The pollution slightly intensifies the responses of sensitive populations.
Impact: The pollution significantly intensifies the responses of sensitive populations by negatively affecting respiratory and cardiovascular systems.
Impact: Healthy populations feel ill. Symptoms of heart and lung diseases are intensified.
Impact: Healthy populations are easily tired and tend to prematurely develop some diseases.
Advice: All populations can participate in outdoor activities.
Advice: Some sensitive populations should reduce outdoor activities.
Advice: Vulnerable populations, such as the elderly, children, and people with respiratory diseases, should reduce strenuous outdoor exercise.
Advice: Vulnerable populations, such as the elderly, children, and people with respiratory diseases, should avoid strenuous outdoor exercise. Healthy populations should reduce outdoor activities.
Advice: Vulnerable populations, such as the elderly, children, and people with respiratory diseases, should stay indoors. Healthy populations should avoid outdoor activities.
Advice: All populations should stay indoors.
"Reason of this marking...... hoping to have your contact information for contacting you."
No network,please open the WiFi in the tray or enable network.
network anomalies,re-send after checking the network.
